0: We love the understated ambience the hotel carries and the location is just right
Went there on Christmas party and atmosphere was amazing
Great bar area in a relaxed atmosphere lovely pool and steam room
The whole experience was great but might try another hotel like the Hilton next time just to compare
The staff again were very friendly and efficient but the food and atmosphere were a little pedestrian
Aside from the room the Opus bar was pretty good with a contemporary ambience and the food room service was excellent
We have sat in motorway service areas with a better ambiance
Delighted with the fantastic service excelent food and ambience
Hotel decorated lovely and bar has a good atmosphere but it ran out of pino Grigio
1: Worst experience in a hotel in years
We have always had a good experience at this hotel so I am sure we were just unlucky this time
A fabulous weekend stay spoiled only by a disappointing spa experience
I had previously stated at the hotel and had a horrible experience
However this year was a terrible experience and we will not be returning
2: We booked our trip 3 months prior to our visit I visit the hotel frequently with my partner and we have always had only good experiences so this time I decided to take my friends after I have talked only good about the place I received an email to check in early and as we had booked two twin rooms I was surprised to see there was no twin option on the booking I phoned the hotel straight away and double checked my booking they explained there had been a mistake and it was booked as doubles and they would rectify straight away and I should be able to proceed with online check in When this was not the case I phones back again and was told not to worry Is was a system glitch and when I arrive in the day they would make sure check in was quick and easy The day came and we went to check in only to find there was no twin rooms left I was furious and explained that I had been on the phone 3 times to make sure I had twin rooms the embarrassing conflict happened in front of ques of people at the check in desk and I felt really embarrassed the out come was to put a single bed in each double room so we had separate beds which was n’t ideal but we had no choice as the hotel was “ fully booked ”
Drinks are not cheap but the surroundings make it worth it

The fact that we could not make use of these facilities has made us feel very let down We feel like we have paid a premium price bit without use of the facilities we really wanted to make our experience so special and relaxing
Frankly we are not experienced in that type of cuisine so were most grateful to the lead waiter who patiently talked us through the menu and guided us in our choices
And the room was looking slightly tired not to detract down the overall experience which was great
And it must be a mass hallucination too given the number of other people telling me about their similar experience
Apart from the breakfast as above it would have been difficult to beat the experience

The bar area at night more of a night club atmosphere music far far to loud was awful and although you offer a selection of cocktails no classics was available and when asked at the bar can you do this one NO even tho it looked like you had all the ingedients behind the bar
Despite setting the room heater to the maximum setting the room remained cool
First stay in Manchester and even though our coronation Street tour was cancelled due to virus the hotel and our experience made up for it
